de.hsb.ms.syn.common.vo

Class DraggableNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.vo.Node
        • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.vo.DraggableNode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FxNode, GenNode, MicrophoneInputNode

    public abstract class DraggableNode
extends Node
    Base class for Nodes that can be dragged around with the mouse. It is extended by GenNode and FXNode

    • Method Detail

      • getAlgorithm

        public AudioAlgorithm getAlgorithm()
        Get the DraggableNode's delegate object (to access its NodeProperties, for instance)
        Returns:

      • setAlgorithm

        public void setAlgorithm(AudioAlgorithm algorithm)
        Sets the Node's delegate to the given reference. Note that FXNode objects can only delegate to Delegates in the vo.fx package, and GenNode objects can only delegate to vo.gen Delegates. This method checks the class of the passed-in delegate and logs a warning if this check fails
        Parameters:
        algorithm -
